name: Augment Calling
text: Your attempts to bind or call outsiders are highly potent.
prerequisites: Spell Focus (conjuration); ability to cast lesser planar ally, lesser planar binding, or a higher-level version of these spells.
benefit:
Choose a subtype of outsider, such as angel or elemental. When using the planar ally or planar binding spells, you can call 2 additional Hit Dice of outsiders with the chosen subtype. You also gain an additional benefit depending on what spell you are casting.

When you call an outsider of the chosen subtype with planar ally spells, you reduce the price it demands for service by 25%, to a minimum of 1,000 gp.

When you bind an outsider of the chosen subtype with planar binding spells and request a service of the outsider, you gain a +2 bonus on Charisma checks to do so.
special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a different subtype of outsider.
text_zh: 你对异界生物的束缚和呼唤更加强而有力。
prerequisites_zh: 法术专攻（咒法）；可以使用次级异界盟友，次级异界誓缚或者这些法术的高级版本。
benefit_zh:
选择一个异界生物的亚种，例如天使或者元素。当使用异界盟友或者异界誓缚法术时，你呼唤指定亚种的异界生物，可呼唤的生命骰上限+2（When using the planar ally or planar binding spells, you can call 2 additional Hit Dice of outsiders with the chosen subtype.）。取决于你所使用的法术，你还将获得额外收益。

当你使用异界盟友法术召唤指定亚种的异界生物时，减少所需支付的服务费用25%，最少为1000g。

当你使用异界誓缚法术束缚指定亚种的异界生物并要求他们的服务时，你在魅力检定上获得+2加值。
special_zh: 你可以多次选择这个专长。这一专长的收益不会累积。每次你选择这个专长时，它都应用于一个不同的异界生物亚种。
